esoteric_religions.name: Hermeticism
esoteric_religions.description: Hermeticism is an ancient spiritual and philosophical tradition attributed to the teachings of Hermes Trismegistus. It focuses on the pursuit of spiritual transformation, the unity of the divine and the human, and the principles of correspondence, as above so below.

esoteric_religions.name: Gnosticism
esoteric_religions.description: Gnosticism is a collection of ancient religious ideas and systems that emphasize the importance of gnosis, or direct knowledge of the divine. It often includes beliefs about the existence of a hidden or higher spiritual reality and the divine spark within individuals.

esoteric_religions.name: Kabbalah
esoteric_religions.description: Kabbalah is a mystical and esoteric Jewish tradition that seeks to understand the relationship between the divine and the human. It explores various symbolic and metaphysical aspects of the universe and offers insights into spiritual growth and enlightenment.

esoteric_religions.name: Thelema
esoteric_religions.description: Thelema is a modern esoteric religion founded by Aleister Crowley. It revolves around the central principle of 'Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law,' emphasizing individual freedom, self-discovery, and the pursuit of one's true purpose in life.

esoteric_religions.name: Rosicrucianism
esoteric_religions.description: Rosicrucianism is a spiritual and philosophical movement that emerged in the early 17th century. It combines elements of Christian mysticism, alchemy, and esoteric knowledge to explore topics such as spiritual development, symbolism, and the quest for wisdom.

esoteric_religions.name: Anthroposophy
esoteric_religions.description: Anthroposophy, developed by Rudolf Steiner, is a spiritual philosophy that encompasses various aspects of human existence, including education, art, agriculture, and medicine. It emphasizes the development of spiritual insight and the integration of spiritual principles into daily life.

esoteric_religions.name: Theosophy
esoteric_religions.description: Theosophy is a spiritual movement that seeks to explore and understand the nature of divinity, the universe, and human existence. It combines elements from various religious and philosophical traditions and encourages the development of spiritual knowledge and universal brotherhood.

esoteric_religions.name: Eckankar
esoteric_religions.description: Eckankar is a contemporary spiritual movement that focuses on personal spiritual experiences and self-realization. It teaches techniques for spiritual growth and explores concepts such as soul travel, karma, and the divine sound current.
